findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: SQL query with string formatting (SQL injection risk)
findings.description: Pattern detected: f"SELECT * FROM '{hf_path}' USING SAMPLE {n} (RESERVOIR, {seed}
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries with ? or %s placeholders

findings.title: SQL query with string formatting (SQL injection risk)
findings.description: Pattern detected: f"SELECT * FROM '{hf_path}' USING SAMPLE {n}
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries with ? or %s placeholders

findings.description: Pattern detected: f"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM '{hf_path}
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries with ? or %s placeholders

findings.description: Pattern detected: f" WHERE {where}
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries with ? or %s placeholders

findings.title: TRANSITIVE TRUST ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects skills that delegate trust to untrusted external content: run scripts
findings.snippet: # Scripts auto-install requirements when run with: uv run scripts/script_name.py
findings.remediation: Review and remove transitive trust abuse pattern

findings.title: Environment variable harvesting detected
findings.description: Script iterates through environment variables in skills/huggingface-skills/skills/hugging-face-datasets/scripts/sql_manager.py
findings.remediation: Remove environment variable collection unless explicitly required and documented

findings.title: Suspicious URL detected: https://huggingface.co/datasets/
findings.description: Script contains suspicious URL that may be used for data exfiltration
findings.remediation: Review URL and ensure it's legitimate and documented
